Articles.Content: I don't want procedural fairings to cover up my entire payload. Im doing an Apollo remake and I need the fairing to cover up just the LEM and ramp up to the bottom of the CM. I see there are two base types in PF. Custom bases and rings. And then there two fairing types. How can I achieve this exactly? Ive seen it done before.
I think Fairing interstage is what you need, there is one at Procedural Fairings
O I didn't notice that part. Im only seeing one though are there larger sizes?
I think the interstage is the most "Procedural" part in the mod, you can even Change Base size whit N key
